Description: This back bay corner residence boasts a must-see-to-believe, 600 square foot private roofdeck with spectacular 360 degree views of Boston. Located on the top floor of an elevator building, 960 square feet with bespoke hardwood flooring, and two nice sized bedrooms. The generous living room space flows nicely off of the kitchen, and receives ample light from multiple directions of window exposures. Common Laundry in the basement.
